item.title: Alec's 5-5-5 Deal: 5 Movie, Album, and Book Recommendations from 2024
item.description: 5 movies, 5 albums, 5 books that you get an unasked opinion about, for free! What a deal. With this list and website I guess I am essentially combining two things I’ve been doing a lot of this year, especially quite recently: tech-tinkering and journaling. So I guess here you have a more focused, public version of a journal entry of mine, that required a lot of GitHub commits in order to appear before your face.
